messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Spacepizza Division

Cargo: It looks like a neighbouring station accidentally delivered their pizza to you instead

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Uh UHH I hate Niggers UH U HU HHH

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Please use protection when having sex with a NIGGER

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Heads of Staff Meeting Room.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by James Blue. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Fucking Niggers ruining everything uhh Uolh UHhh

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: stop that or else we will bsa white people

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Central Command are a bunch of fucking niggers

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Also, if you continue abusing your communications system, we will find your ass.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: and this time we won't use a small payload

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: "I'm a fucking nigger and I hate freedom" - centcomm

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Thats it. Send a larger payload to GRID 4.4.4.55. AKA: Retarded Asshat.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: i already did that dave get off the vox

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Cargo shuttle commandeered by CentCom.

The cargo shuttle should return in five minutes. Have some supply points for your trouble.
